answers.answer: My niece was born at 36 weeks and was 2kg (4lbs 6oz) she was in for 5 days, but has had zero complications from being 4 weeks early. She is now 8 and a half and is at the top of her second grade class in math!I think 36 weeks isn't too early

The mostly kept her for 5 days because it was in January and she was having temp issue, in the USA that probably would have sent her home sooner. She was attached to any tubes, no trouble breathing and could eat from a bottle.

question: Just talked to special ob and he's convinced that baby needs to be out. I'm due July 25. This pregnancy has been rather terrible and I have been hospitalized 4 times and I do have preeclampsia but I'm scared.  First baby came early and had to stay in hospital 3 weeks. Not the greatest feeling to have to visit your child in NICU seeing all those tubes and her only being 2.4 lbs. He said a week and a half. I'm scared now but that's not to early right??
title: Moved C-Section again...
